message: You stop on your travels, and admire the landscape. you take a depth breath in (+5 air)
While walking in a back ally, you find some pears. without thinking you take them. (+2 rotting pear)

you step into a portal, find you self in a strange place. after some talking you find out the locals called it 'Jumpsville'. suddently you are sucked back to your own world, you got some gold from a stranger before you left. much more valuable in this world then theirs you think. (+ 30 gold)
You find a nice place for the night, your health doubled (max 40)
While walking out of a cave you find a skeleton. between the rib bones you find some arrows, probably what killed the man (+5 arrows)
you walk into the portal to Jumpsville, you see a mysterious figure, they call him vivax, and another dude shouting about how he is the real vivax. you back off slowly into the portal.

kwargs.new_message: you find a weird stone in the mountains, after some inspection you see it has letters. first you cant read them, but suddently you somehow can. you see a green glow from your pocket. you read what it says, some small stones nearby turns to gold. +5 gold

message: you find a weird stone in the mountains, after some inspection you see it has letters. but you cant read them. maybe you should have paid better attention in school?
While walking by the portal you see a dragon fly into it.
